text: Allahale tinala'i aphno krpale je jati pradana gareko cha, tyasama tiniharu ati khusi chan ra khusiyali mana'iraheka chan uniharuka lagi jo ahilesam'ma tiniharuma sam'milita huna sakenan ra pachadi chan, yasa karana harsita chan ki tinala'i pani na ta kunai bhayaâ€“trasa huncha ra na ta tini duhkhi hunechan
